titleInfo.title: In Jail in the Parish jail of the Parish of Assumption.

mods.abstract: In Jail in the Parish jail of the Parish of Assumption. The negro boy named Henry says he belongs to Ben Smith (Petit Caillou) of the Parish of Terrebonne; 5 feet 7 inches and a half high having a scar on the breast & another on the left leg wearing a little beard on the chin & aged about 28 to 30 years. Also the negro woman named Maria aged about 17 or 18 years. belonging to the same

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
